metadata.title: CVE-2009-1142 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in open-vm-tools 2009.03.18-154848. Local users cangain privileges via a symlink attack on /tmp files ifvmware-user-suid-wrapper is setuid root and the ChmodChownDirectoryfunction is enabled.

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
